about_the_game:
Filthy water drips down into rusty industrial caverns, covering up a planet torn of its lifeblood.
Somewhere, a figure trudges through the darkness, talking to themselves and making up conspiracy theories.
A Sound rings out through the artificial cavern, calling back to a dark and ancient era.

This is the Original Soundtrack for [PSYCHOPOMP]
Featuring bizarre sounds of all sorts, experience the dark sounds of that endless abyss yourself!
